thread.title: Dead body recovered from Manawatu River
thread.title_full: Dead body recovered from Manawatu River

title: Dead body recovered from Manawatu River
text:
Dead body recovered from Manawatu River Last updated 22:44, February 24 2017 Murray Wilson 
A police dive squad looking for a 36-year-old man near Ballance Bridge at the Manawatu Gorge. 
Following a search of the Manawatu River today, a body has been recovered. 
Items belonging to a man who went missing in the Manawatu Gorge three days ago were found on the edge of the river. 
Search and rescue teams and a police dive squad resumed their search for the 36-year-old man in thick fog near Ballance Bridge about 8.30am on Friday. 
They had moved their search to the Ashhurst end of the river by about 1pm. 
READ MORE: Search for missing man in Manawatu Gorge moves 
Police released a statement about the recovery just after 10pm and are working to notify family members and complete a formal identification of the body. 
A police spokeswoman would not confirm if the body was that of the man they had been searching for.
